title: Sunrise
description: True Blood has some competition . . .The second book of the Pact Arcanum series, this prequel to Sunset details the start of the truce between vampires and vampire slayers.A vampire attack in a deserted alley introduces three friends to a dark underworld of supernatural predators.Will they survive the bloodthirsty evil they face?If you are looking for a gritty, adult answer to the Twilight Saga , look no further.For more details about Arshad, to read the full reviews, or to sign up for the newsletter, check out the author's website at pactarcanum.com .Search on " Pact Arcanum " to find all the books in the series.
author: Arshad Ahsanuddin
